Deific Decay.name: Deific Decay
Deific Decay.fullText:
God Fragment Attack 11Deific Decay

You harness the necrotic power of a dead god’s corpse, and you hurl it at an unsuspecting foe.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement, Necrotic
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d12 + Constitution modifier necrotic damage.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 90.
Deific Decay.flavor: You harness the necrotic power of a dead god’s corpse, and you hurl it at an unsuspecting foe.

Deific Doom.name: Deific Doom
Deific Doom.fullText:
God Fragment Utility 12Deific Doom

You borrow the remnants of power from a dead god, instilling your presence with an overwhelming sense of loss and regret.

Daily        Arcane, Zone
Minor Action      Close burst 2

Effect: The burst creates a zone of suffering, loss, and regret that lasts until the end of the encounter. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Each enemy within the zone takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 90.
Deific Doom.flavor: You borrow the remnants of power from a dead god, instilling your presence with an overwhelming sense of loss and regret.
Deific Doom.effect: The burst creates a zone of suffering, loss, and regret that lasts until the end of the encounter. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Each enemy within the zone takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws.

Vestige of Karmath.name: Vestige of Karmath
Vestige of Karmath.fullText:
God Fragment Attack 20Vestige of Karmath

You overwhelm an enemy’s mind with a fragment of Karmath the Unmourned God, giving you control over the creature’s body.

Daily        Arcane, Charm, Implement, Necrotic
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. Will

Hit: The target is dominated (save ends).

  Aftereffect: The target takes 2d8 + your Constitution modifier necrotic damage.

Miss: The target is dazed (save ends).

Effect: You gain access to the vestige of Karmath the Unmourned God.

  Karmath pact Boon: One creature cursed by you that you can see takes a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends).

  Eyes of the Vestige Augment: Until the end of your next turn, each enemy that starts its turn within 2 squares of your eyes of the vestige target takes 1d6 necrotic damage.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 90.
Vestige of Karmath.flavor: You overwhelm an enemy’s mind with a fragment of Karmath the Unmourned God, giving you control over the creature’s body.
Vestige of Karmath.aftereffect: The target takes 2d8 + your Constitution modifier necrotic damage.
Vestige of Karmath.effect: You gain access to the vestige of Karmath the Unmourned God.
Vestige of Karmath.karmathPactBoon: One creature cursed by you that you can see takes a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends).
Vestige of Karmath.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Until the end of your next turn, each enemy that starts its turn within 2 squares of your eyes of the vestige target takes 1d6 necrotic damage.
